title: And STILL no USB-C iPhone...

But last but not least, iPadOS will have Stage Manager, resizable windows, and an expandable desktop when you connect to external monitors, it's happening. Google is being forced to pay Australian politician John Barilaro 715,000 Australian dollars, or about 515,000 USD, for failing to remove relentless racist and abusive videos, quote unquote, posted by YouTuber Jordan Shanks. Barilaro initially requested that Google take the videos down, but the company denied the videos were defamatory. It's an interesting example of why tech platforms have scrambled to crack down on some potentially harmful types of speech, because even Google probably doesn't have enough lawyers to handle lawsuits from everybody that's been called something horrible online.
